snippet: The Paralympic gold medalist who was found guilty in the killing of his girlfriend will leave prison after serving about one year of his five-year sentence.
abstract: South African paralympic gold medalist Oscar Pistorius, who was convicted in death of his girlfriend, is to be released after serving one year of five-year sentence; will spend last four years of his sentence under house arrest; girlfriend's family and women's groups decry early release.
lead_paragraph: The Paralympic gold medalist who was found guilty in the killing of his girlfriend will leave prison after serving about one year of his five-year sentence.

headline.main: Oscar Pistorius Will Leave Prison for House Arrest
headline.print_headline: Pistorius Will Leave Prison for House Arrest
